Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
This unit is immune to all negative morale effects and gains one level of Stagger Resistance.[br/]This unit is now considered [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue].
该单位免疫所有负面士气效果并获得 1 级动摇抵抗。[br/]该单位现在将被视作获得了[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]。

Each time this unit is damaged by another unit, the attacker has a strength {SoulBurnChance}[strengthpsyche/] chance to become [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred]. The attacker also gains [abilityred]Remorse[/abilityred], a stacking debuff that applies {RemorseHappiness} for {RemorseTurns}.[br/]This unit is now considered [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue].

每当该单位因另一个单位而受到伤害时，攻击者有 {SoulBurnChance}[strengthpsyche/] 力量几率受到[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]。此外，攻击者还会获得[abilityred]懊悔[/abilityred]。这是一种可叠加的减益状态，会造成 {RemorseHappiness}，持续 {RemorseTurns}。[br/]该单位现在将被视作获得了[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]。
This unit is filled with remorse, and suffers from {RemorseMorale}.
该单位现在将被视作获得了[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]。
Dispel hostile effects from self and all adjacent Biological and Cyborg units, and heal them for {HealingTouchHP}.
驱散目标非无意识生物或半机械人单位身上的负面效果，同时治疗 {HealingTouchHP}。
This unit can no longer trigger Overwatch attacks.[br/]This unit is now considered [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue].
该单位将不再触发警戒攻击。[br/]该单位现在将被视作获得了[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]。
All units adjacent to this one have a strength {PacifiedChance} chance of becoming [abilityred]Pacified[/abilityred], disabling damaging abilities for {PacificationAuraTurns}.
所有与该单位相邻的单位有 {PacifiedChance} 的力量几率被[abilityred]安抚平息[/abilityred]，伤害型技能将会失效，持续 {PacificationAuraTurns}。
This unit cannot bring themselves to use any offensive abilities.
该单位无法使用攻击型技能。
This unit reflects {ShieldofReckoningChance} of all damage done to them back to their attacker.[br/]This unit is now considered [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue].
该单位受到的所有伤害的 {ShieldofReckoningChance} 将会反弹给攻击者。[br/]该单位现在将被视作获得了[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]。

We accept everyone who we can possibly sway to follow the Celestian way. By aiding others, we reveal to them the one and only truth.[br/][br/]The cooldown for requesting a new quest from a faction is reduced by {durationChange}[turn/]
我们接纳所有可能会改变信仰并追随星神之人。通过帮助他人，我们会向他们揭露这世间唯一的真相。[br/][br/]向阵营请求新任务的冷却时间减少 {durationChange}[turn/]

Convincing others of the justness of your cause makes them more inclined to sell their treasures for less.[br/][br/]Cost of bribing NPC Faction stacks is reduced by {Bribereduction}.[br/]The [influence/] cost of items you can buy from Dwelling Shops is reduced by {LoweredCost}.[br/][br/][firecol]Dwelling Shop discounts can never exceed {MaxDiscountPercentage}[/firecol]
说服他人相信你所从之事中的正义，能够让他们以更低的价格出售他们的宝物。[br/][br/]贿赂 NPC 阵营的消耗减少 {Bribereduction}。[br/]从居住地商店购买物品所需的[influence/]消耗减少 {LoweredCost}。[br/][br/][firecol]居住地商店折扣不会超过 {MaxDiscountPercentage}[/firecol]

By teaching your population to live in harmony with the world and each other, they will live a happier life.[br/][br/]Each Colony you own that is not of your starting race provides an additional {RaceRelations} to relations with that race.[br/]All your Colonies have {HappinessBonus}[happiness/].
教导你的居民与万物和谐生息，他们将过上更幸福的生活。[br/][br/]你所拥有的每一个殖民地（初始种族殖民地除外）将额外提供 {RaceRelations} 种族关系。[br/]你的所有殖民地获得 {HappinessBonus}[happiness/]。

Not everyone can be shown the light through talking and scriptures - some will have to be forced to bend the knee to our teachings.[br/][br/]Your Enlightened units deal {AdditionalDamage} added damage to non-Enlightened units.
并非所有人都能通过传道和圣典得到开化，有些人必须被施以蛮力才会臣服于我们的教诲。[br/][br/]你的启迪单位对非启迪单位额外造成 {AdditionalDamage} 伤害。
Your [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] units deal an additional {AdditionalDamage} damage to non-Enlightened units.
你的[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]单位对非启迪单位额外造成 {AdditionalDamage} 伤害。
对非启迪单位额外造成 {AdditionalDamage} 伤害

By chanting our beliefs every day, we can disincentivize most unwanted visitors from coming near us again.[br/][br/]Marauders no longer attack your Colonies and sector bases, nor do they trespass in your domain.
每日吟诵我们的信仰，把那些我们不愿再见之人统统挡于门外。[br/][br/]劫掠者不再会攻击你的殖民地和区域基地，也无法侵入你的领域。
This unit is Enlightened according to the Celestian ways. It has {EnlightenedMorale} and deals {EnlightenedDam} extra damage against units with Soulburn.
该单位在遵循星神之路上获得了启迪，拥有 {EnlightenedMorale} 并可对受到灵魂燃烧影响的单位额外造成 {EnlightenedDam} 伤害。
对受到灵魂燃烧影响的单位额外造成 {EnlightenedDam} 伤害。
Strength {SoulburnChance} chance to apply [abilityRed]Soulburn[/abilityRed] until end of combat.
有 {SoulburnChance} 的力量几率施加[abilityRed]灵魂燃烧[/abilityRed]，效果持续到战斗结束。
This unit's soul is on fire, exposing its true essence and weakness. [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] units deal {EnlightenedDam} damage against this unit.
该单位的灵魂正在熊熊燃烧，本质和弱点暴露无遗。[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]单位可对该单位造成 {EnlightenedDam} 伤害。
A melee attack that unleashes the infernal power of a thousand suns.
能够释放出千阳地狱之力的近战攻击。
A melee attack that unleashes the infernal power of a thousand suns.
能够释放出千阳地狱之力的近战攻击。
The Lightbringer jumps towards target ground hex and lands heavily, dealing damage to adjacent units.
光明使者跃向目标陆地单元格并重重落下，对相邻单位造成伤害。
The Lightbringer jumps towards target ground hex and lands heavily, dealing damage to adjacent units and gaining {AssaultDashShields} for {AssaultDashTurns}.
光明使者跃向目标陆地单元格并重重落下，对相邻单位造成伤害，同时获得 {AssaultDashShields}，持续 {AssaultDashTurns}。
The Lightbringer's Harrier swoops towards target ground hex, dealing damage to adjacent units. The unit enters into a [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue] afterwards.
光明使者的鹞龙战骑朝目标陆地单元格俯冲，对相邻单位造成伤害。随后该单位将进入[abilityblue]防御模式[/abilityblue]。
This unit is immune to Psionic Status Effects.
该单位免疫灵能状态效果。

Target friendly unit receives [abilityblue]Guidance[/abilityblue], gaining {CelestialGuidanceAccuracy} accuracy and is considered [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] until end of combat. If this ability targets an already Enlightened unit, they receive an additional {CelestialGuidanceMorale}.[br/]Does not work on Mindless units.
目标友方单位接收到[abilityblue]指引[/abilityblue]，获得 {CelestialGuidanceAccuracy} 准度并将被视作获得了[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]，效果持续到战斗结束。如果该单位已经获得了启迪，则将获得额外 {CelestialGuidanceMorale}。[br/]对无意识单位无效。

Target unit gains [abilityblue]Psionic Regeneration[/abilityblue], healing it for {RegenerativeLightHP} at the end of each turn for {RegenerativeLightDuration}. The unit is dispelled of all negative status effects when this ability is used.
目标单位获得[abilityblue]灵能再生[/abilityblue]，每回合结束时治疗 {RegenerativeLightHP}，持续 {RegenerativeLightDuration}。使用该技能时会驱散该单位身上的所有负面状态效果。
Use starlight to attack in a {hexrad} hex radius.
使用星光攻击 {hexrad} 个单元格范围的敌人。
Use starlight to attack in a {hexrad} hex radius.
使用星光攻击 {hexrad} 个单元格范围的敌人。

The Ascended Teacher guides those who join them in battle along the Path of Light. All friendly units in the army gain [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] and [abilityblue]Resurgence[/abilityblue].[br/]Doesn't work on Ascended Teachers and Mindless Units.
升华导师将指引那些追随光明之路而加入到他们战斗之中的人。所有友方军队单位获得[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]和[abilityblue]复苏[/abilityblue]。[br/]对升华导师和无意识单位无效。

Target enemy unit has a {strengthmindcontrol} strength chance to be [abilityred]Mind Controlled[/abilityred], increasing to a {strengthmindcontrolimprov} strength chance if the target is affected by [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred]. If they survive until end of combat, they are turned into a colonist. If this fails, the unit takes {PsionicDamage} damage.

目标敌方单位有 {strengthmindcontrol} 力量几率被[abilityred]心灵控制[/abilityred]，如果该单位受到[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]的影响，则被控制概率提升至 {strengthmindcontrolimprov}。[br/]如果该单位在战斗结束时仍然存活，则将会被转化成移住民。如果控制失败，该单位将受到 {PsionicDamage} 的伤害。
An enemy unit has laid down their arms and joined one of your colonies.
敌方单位放下了武器并加入到了你的一个殖民地。

A surge of pure Celestial light heals all Enlightened units for {RadianceHeal} Hit Points and revives friendly units in a {CelestialRadianceRadius} hex radius area. The healing will be stronger for each friendly Enlightened unit in the battle.
一道纯净的星神之光涌向所有启迪单位，治疗 {RadianceHeal} 生命值并复活 {CelestialRadianceRadius} 个单元格范围的友方单位。战斗中的友方启迪单位数量越多，治疗效果就越强。

A surge of Celestial Wrath courses down from the heavens, damaging all enemy units in a {CelestialWrathRadius} hex radius area. The damage will increase for each friendly Enlightened unit in the battle.
星神的怒火从天空倾泻而下，对 {CelestialWrathRadius} 个单元格范围的所有敌人造成伤害。战斗中的友方启迪单位数量越多，伤害就越高。
{EnlightenedDamageModifier} for each Enlightened unit in battle. Stacks up to 5 times.
战斗中每有一个启迪单位，提升 {EnlightenedDamageModifier}。最多叠加 5 层。
{EnlightenedHealModifier} for each Enlightened unit in battle. Stacks up to 5 times.
战斗中每有一个启迪单位，提升 {EnlightenedHealModifier}。最多叠加 5 层。
Target unit heals for {CleansingLightHP} and is dispelled of all negative status effects.
目标单位治疗 {CleansingLightHP} 并驱散自身所有负面状态效果。
Target unit is dispelled of negative status effects and is healed for {CleanseHeal}. This heals for an additional {CleanseAddedHeal} for each [abilityblue]Enlightened[/abilityblue] unit in battle.
驱散目标友方单位身上的负面状态效果并治疗 {CleanseHeal}。战斗中每有一个[abilityblue]启迪[/abilityblue]单位，便额外治疗 {CleanseAddedHeal}。
Utilize Psionic energy to pre-emptively ward a friendly living unit from death. If this battle results in victory, the target unit is revived after combat ends if it died during combat.
利用灵能能量提前保护友方存活的单位，使其免于死亡。如果目标单位在战斗中阵亡且本次战斗获得了胜利，则该单位将会在战斗结束时复活。
For {NegateTurns}, target friendly unit is immune to all damage, but they cannot move or use abilities during this time.
目标友方单位免疫所有伤害，但也无法移动或使用技能，持续 {NegateTurns}。
Unit is immune to all damage, but they cannot move or use abilities.
该单位免疫所有伤害，但也无法移动或使用技能。

Target non-Mindless enemy's spirit flashes brightly, causing [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] and [abilityred]High Impact Stagger[/abilityred] to itself and all enemy units in a 2 hex radius around it.
以非无意识敌方单位为目标，使其灵魂闪烁出耀眼的光芒，对该单位及周围 2 个单元格范围的敌人造成[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]和[abilityred]高度冲击动摇[/abilityred]。
Block all Tactical Operations and unit damaging abilities for {ReprieveTurns} combat turn. Enlightened units heal for {ReprieveHP}.
阻拦所有战术行动和单位伤害技能，持续 {ReprieveTurns} 战斗回合。启迪单位治疗 {ReprieveHP}。
Target friendly army heals to {BlessingofStarlightHP}. They also gain Stagger Resistance and {accuracy} accuracy until the end of their next battle.
目标友方军队治疗 {BlessingofStarlightHP}。此外，还会获得动摇抵抗和 {accuracy} 准度，效果持续到下次战斗结束。
Your army has been successfully blessed by Starlight. Their accuracy is increased and they have more stagger resistance until the end of their next battle. They have also recovered all their [hp/]
你的军队受到了星光的祝福。军队准度得到了提升并且获得了更高的动摇抵抗，效果持续到下次战斗结束，同时恢复全部[hp/]。
Your army has been healed and gained a boost in accaracy and Stagger Resistance until the end of their next battle.
你的军队已被治愈，并且准度和动摇抵抗获得了提升，效果持续到下次战斗结束。
Target enemy army takes {SoulfireDam} damage and suffers [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] whenever they engage in battle for {SoulfireTurn}.
每当目标敌方军队参与战斗时，将会受到 {SoulfireDam} 伤害和[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 {SoulfireTurn}。
Our Soulfire operation was successful - the enemy units in the targeted army suffered {SoulfireDamage} damage and are afflicted by [abilityRed]Soulburn[/abilityRed] for {SoulfireTurn}.
我们的灵魂烈焰行动成功了，目标军队中的敌方单位受到了 {SoulfireDamage} 伤害并遭受了[abilityRed]灵魂燃烧[/abilityRed]，持续 {SoulfireTurn}。
Soulfire was partially resisted by the enemy army. The army's units took {SoulfireFailureDamage} damage, but they are not suffering from [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred].
敌方军队抵抗了部分灵魂烈焰。该军队单位受到了 {SoulfireFailureDamage} 伤害，但并未遭受[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]。

A Celestian Soulfire attack was launched against one of our armies! The army took {SoulfireDamage} and will be afflicted with [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] whenever they enter battle during the next {SoulfireTurn}.
我们的一支军队受到了星神灵魂烈焰的攻击！在下个{SoulfireTurn}期间，每当该军队加入战斗时，将会受到 {SoulfireDamage} 并遭受[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]。

A Celestian Soulfire attack was launched against one of our armies. Luckily, it was detected before it could take full effect and the damage is minimized. The army took {SoulfireFailureDamage} but is otherwise unaffected.
我们的一支军队受到了星神灵魂烈焰的攻击。幸运的是，我们在其发挥全部效果前及时侦测到了该次攻击，使伤害降至了最低。该军队受到了 {SoulfireFailureDamage}，除此之外没有受到其他影响。
Target army takes damage equal to {Damage} of their [hp/]
目标军队受到等同于其[hp/]{Damage} 的伤害。
目标军队遭受[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 {turns}
On failure, the target takes {Damage} damage but is not afflicted with [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred].
如果失败，目标将受到 {Damage} 伤害，但不会遭受[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]影响。
Spawns a [abilityred]Veil of Tranquility[/abilityred] in the target sector. This hazard affects the economy and units in this sector. It also has a tactical combat effect in the sector.
在目标区域生成一个[abilityred]静谧帷幕[/abilityred]。该灾害将影响该区域的经济和单位，同时该区域将具有战术战斗效果。
We successfully adjusted the trajectory of the comet and it crashed in the targeted sector.
我们调整了彗星轨道并使其坠落在了目标区域。
Our Psionics were incapable of changing the comet's trajectory. As a result of this, all of the Psionic energy used was released in the target sector, healing all units there.
我们的灵能没能改变彗星轨道。因此，所有使用的灵能能量被释放到了目标区域，使该区域所有单位获得了治疗。
The enemy has crashed a comet into a sector near some of our troops, making them waver in awe of the Celestian cause.
敌人使彗星坠落在了我们部队附近的一个区域，出于对星神的敬畏，我们的部队产生了动摇。
The Celestians failed to pull a comet down towards the planetary surface. This resulted in a Psionic explosion that healed all units in the sector.
星神信徒没能使彗星降落至星球地表，导致该区域灵能爆发，使所有位于该区域的单位都获得了治疗。
星神单位恢复全部生命值。
On failure, all units in the sector are fully healed.
如果失败，该区域所有单位将恢复全部生命值。
Unwavering faith in the face of bloodshed discourages your enemies to engage in war. The targeted player cannot use any Casus Belli for {turns}.
你面对杀戮所展现出的坚定信念使你的敌人无心再战。目标玩家无法使用任何宣战理由，持续 {turns}。
The targeted player is unable to use any Casus Belli.
目标玩家无法使用任何宣战理由。
Our missionaries report that our enemies are realizing the futility of fighting the Celestian Order and see no reason to attack us.
我们的传教士报告称，敌人意识到与星神修会对抗将只是徒劳之举，并且也没有攻击我们的理由。
Our missionaries have managed to discourage our enemies to go to war against us, but they are aware that we are behind this coercion.
我们的传教士设法阻止了敌人向我们开战，但敌人已经知道了我们是这次镇压的幕后主谋。
Our missionaries were unsuccessful in discouraging the populace from wanting to go to war against us. Our involvement remains hidden.
我们的传教士未能打消居民想要与我们开战的想法，但我们我们参与其中的行踪并未暴露。
Our missionaries were unsuccessful in discouraging the populace from wanting to go to war against us. Unfortunately, our involvement in this tactic has been revealed.
我们的传教士未能打消居民想要与我们开战的想法。另外不幸的是，我们参与此次战术的行踪暴露了。
Our enemies have managed to talk our population out of wanting to go to war. We have sources on who was behind this. Surely this cannot go unanswered…
敌人设法说服了我们的民众打消了开战的想法。我们已经掌握了幕后主谋的线索，这件事肯定不会就这么不了了之的…
Our enemies tried to talk our population out of wanting to go to war but failed to do so. We have sources on who was behind this. Surely this cannot go unanswered…
敌人尝试说服我们的民众打消开战的想法但却无功而返。我们已经掌握了幕后主谋的线索，这件事肯定不会就这么不了了之的…

Lowers the targeted player's standing with his most renowned faction by {FactionRelations} points and adds the same amount to your relation level with that faction.[br/][br/]On failure, both players receive {FailRelations} points.
目标玩家声望最高的阵营的关系点数降低 {FactionRelations}，并将该数值增加至你与该阵营的关系点数。[br/][br/]如果失败，双方玩家都将获得 {FailRelations}。
Our diplomats have successfully managed to sway the opinion of one of our enemy's allies, and have solidified their opinion of us at the same time.
我们的外交官成功说服敌人的盟友改变了心意，同时巩固了他们对我们的看法。

Our diplomats have successfully managed to sway the opinion of one of our enemy's allies, and have solidified their opinion of us at the same time. Unfortunately, our involvement in this matter has been discovered.
我们的外交官成功说服敌人的盟友改变了心意，同时巩固了他们对我们的看法。不幸的是，我们参与其中的行踪暴露了。
Our diplomats were unsuccessful in swaying the opinion of one of our enemy's allies, and the resulting confusion ended up benefiting both sides. Our involvement in this matter was not discovered.
我们的外交官虽然没能说服敌人的盟友改变心意，但由此造成的混乱使双方最终均从中获益。我们参与其中的行踪并未暴露。

Our diplomats were unsuccessful in swaying the opinion of one of our enemy's allies, and the resulting confusion ended up benefiting both sides. Unfortunately, our involvement in this matter was discovered.
我们的外交官虽然没能说服敌人的盟友改变心意，但由此造成的混乱使双方最终均从中获益。不幸的是，我们参与其中的行踪暴露了。

Enemy diplomats have been discovered poisoning the minds of our allies, and our relations with that ally have soured because of this. Our agents have managed to trace this nefarious act back to an enemy state.
有人发现敌方外交官正在荼毒我方盟友的思想，我们与该盟友的关系也因此恶化。我们的特工已查明在这卑鄙行径背后作祟的敌对国家。

Enemy diplomats have been discovered poisoning the minds of our allies. However, our ties to this ally have proven strong and the enemy's words ended up helping our cause. Our agents have managed to trace this nefarious attempt back to an enemy state.
有人发现敌方外交官正在荼毒我方盟友的思想。但事实证明，我们与该盟友之间的关系非常牢固，敌人的流言蜚语反倒成了我们事业的助推器。我们的特工已查明在这卑鄙企图背后作祟的敌对国家。

Target owned colony cannot be targeted by harmful effects. Friendly armies within this colony's domain cannot be targeted by harmful operations, and enemies cannot use Tactical Operations within the colony's domain.
以已被拥有的殖民地为目标，使其无法成为有害效果的目标。该殖民地领域内的友方军队无法成为有害行动的目标，且敌人无法在该殖民地领域内使用战术行动。
The Celestial Light shines upon our colony, spreading happiness and morale throughout its sectors.
星神之光照耀我们的殖民地，在各个区域散布幸福、鼓舞士气。
Colony is now protected from other player ops and they cannot use tactical ops in this territory.
殖民地现在免受其他玩家行动影响，其他玩家也不可在此领地使用战术行动。
Target an enemy colony and compel them to your cause. Summon two Tier 1 or Tier 2 units from the target faction, spawning them adjacent to the enemy colony.
强制一个敌方殖民地为你效命。从目标阵营中召唤两个 1 阶或 2 阶单位，将其生成在与敌方殖民地相邻的位置上。
Our missionaries have been successful in converting an enemy military unit to the Path of Light. They have fled the colony and are now under our control.
我们的传教士成功使一个敌方军事单位走上了光明之路。敌人已离开原本的殖民地并已服从于我们的控制。
Our missionaries have been unsuccessful in trying to convert an enemy military unit. The attempt has caused civil unrest in the colony.
我们的传教士没能策反敌方军事单位，不过使其殖民地内部发生了骚乱。
Enemy missionaries have converted one of our military units to join their cause. A unit has left the colony, appearing outside its walls as a new enemy.
敌方传教士策反了我们一个军事单位。单位已离开殖民地，成为了我们城墙外的新敌人。
Enemy missionaries have tried to convert one of our military units to join their cause. They were unsuccessful, but their attempt has caused civil unrest in the colony.
敌方传教士试图策反我们的军事单位。虽然未能成功，但其他们在殖民地内部造成了骚乱。
Wash the entire planet in the Light of Truth, enlightening them to the Celestian way.
用真理之光洗涤整个星球，引领所有人走上星神之路。
Each turn, there is a {LightChance}% chance that a colonist is removed and joins the Celestian player's nearest colony.
每回合有 {LightChance}% 的几率移除一名移住民并使其加入星神玩家最近的殖民地。

Each turn, there is a {LightChance}% chance that a colonist is removed and joins the Celestian player's nearest colony.[br/]All non-Celestian player units gain [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] in combat.
每回合有 {LightChance}% 的几率移除一名移住民并使其加入星神玩家最近的殖民地。[br/]所有非星神玩家单位在战斗中将获得[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]。

Each turn, there is a {LightChance}% chance that a colonist is removed and is added to the Celestian player's nearest colony.[br/]All non-Celestian player units gain [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] in combat.[br/]All Celestian player units heal for {LightHeal}[hp/] each round in combat.
每回合有 {LightChance}% 的几率移除一名移住民并使其加入星神玩家最近的殖民地。[br/]所有非星神玩家单位在战斗中将获得[abilityred]灵魂燃烧[/abilityred]。[br/]所有星神玩家单位在战斗中每轮治疗 {LightHeal}[hp/]。
一名来自{STR_cityName}的移住民逃跑了！
An enemy colonist has converted and joined {STR_cityName}!
一名敌方移住民已经叛变并加入了{STR_cityName}！
The Light of Truth rejuvenates this unit. They heal for {LightHeal}[hp/] at the start of each turn.
真理之光使该单位重新焕发活力。每回合开始时，该单位可治疗 {LightHeal}[hp/]。
Wash target non-Celestian enemy colony and its colonists in Psionically-enforced Truth for {INT_duration}. This increases in strength as you build more Beacons of Truth.
用灵能真理洗涤非星神敌方殖民地及其移住民，持续 {INT_duration}。建造的真理信标越多，此效果越强。
We succeeded transmitting the truth to their colony using our beacons.
我们利用信标将真理成功传输至了他们的殖民地。
Something blocked us from enlightening the colonists to the truth.
某种东西阻碍了我们启迪移住民发现真理。
Our enemy succeeded in sending Psionic messages to our colonists claiming they know the "truth".
敌人成功向我们的移住民发送了灵能信息，声称他们已经掌握了“真理”。
Our enemy failed their attempt to Psionically brainwash our colonists.
敌人对我们移住民进行的灵能洗脑未能成功。
Expose the entire planet to the revelations brought on by the Light of Truth, showing them the Celestian way.[br/][br/]Requires Declaration of Truth level 3.[br/]
使整个星球暴露在真理之光的启示下，为所有人展现星神之路。[br/][br/]需要真理宣言达到等级 3。[br/]
The Light of Truth bathes the world in its warm embrace. Soon there will no war, no conflict, only peace, for everyone, forever.
世界沐浴在温暖的真理之光中。战争与冲突很快会消亡，唯有和平永存。

The Beacon of Truth unlocks the Declaration of Truth Doomsday Weapon. Each additional Beacon of Truth that you build increases the level of the weapon, making it stronger.[br/][br/]Only one Beacon of Truth may be built per colony.
真理信标可以解锁“真理宣言”末日武器。每额外建造一座真理信标，该武器便会升级并变得更加强大。[br/][br/]每个殖民地只能建造一座真理信标。
This unit regenerates {RegenerativeLightHP} at the end of its turn.
该单位在回合结束时可恢复 {RegenerativeLightHP}。
The will of the Star manifests in ethereal form.[br/]Summons an Ascended Teacher under your command.
星辰的意志以虚灵形态显现。[br/]召唤一名升华导师加入你的麾下。
One of our Beacons of Truth has been captured!
我们的一座真理信标已被夺走！
You have lost a Beacon of truth!
你失去了一座真理信标！
{STR_Player} has lost a Beacon of Truth!
You have lost a Beacon of Truth. Our attempt at a Final Revelation has been foiled!
你失去了一座真理信标，实现“终极启示”的计划失败了！
{STR_Player} has lost a Beacon of Truth. Their attempt at Final Revelation has been foiled!
{STR_Player}失去了一座真理信标，实现“终极启示”的计划失败了！
A Player has unleashed their Final Revelation!
一名玩家释放了“终极启示”！
By building a Beacon of Truth, {playerName} now has access to their Doomsday Weapon, the Final Revelation. It is weak now, but will become more powerful as more Beacons of Truth are constructed.
{playerName}通过建造真理信标，现在可以使用末日武器“终极启示”了。虽然目前武器威力尚弱，但会随真理信标数量的增多而变强。
By building a second Beacon of Truth, {playerName} has strengthened their Doomsday Weapon, the Final Revelation. You should plan raids to destroy these structures before they become too powerful.
{playerName}通过建造第二座真理信标强化了“终极启示”末日武器。你应当在这些建筑变得过于强大之前策划突袭并将其摧毁。

By building their final Beacon of Truth, {playerName} has maximized the strength of their Doomsday Weapon, the Final Revelation. They are now close to being able to fully unleash it to win the game. The time to strike is now!
{playerName}通过建造最后一座真理信标使“终极启示”末日武器达到了最强的威力。该玩家马上就可以完全释放其力量来获得游戏胜利了。发动袭击就趁现在！
The Doomsday Timer has been paused! You must reclaim the lost Beacon of Truth, or you will lose your chance at shining a light upon all and revealing the one and only Truth to them.
末日计时器已暂停！你必须重新夺回失去的真理信标，否则你将失去为众生带来光明并揭示唯一真理的机会。
The loss of a Beacon of Truth has canceled the Final Revelation, ending the Doomsday Timer.
失去真理信标使“终极启示”取消，同时末日计时器停止。
The loss of a Beacon of Truth has weakened our Final Revelation, and your Doomsday operations have been canceled
失去真理信标弱化了“终极启示”的威力，你的末日行动遭到中止

Our enemies have activated their Doomsday Weapon! The Final Revelation has spread across the planet, and your own Doomsday Weapon has been wiped out by the cataclysm. You have {numTurns} to destroy one of their Beacons of Truth before they win the game.
敌人激活了他们的末日武器！“终极启示”已遍布整个星球，你的末日武器也在这场大灾变中被毁。你需要在 {numTurns} 内摧毁一座敌人的真理信标，否则敌人将获得游戏胜利。
The Final Revelation is active, and you will win in {numTurns} unless you lose one of your Beacons of Truth.
“终极启示”已激活，只要不失去任何真理信标，你将在 {numTurns} 后获胜。
The Final Revelation is active, and {playerName} will win in {numTurns} unless you can destroy one of their Beacons of Truth.
“终极启示”已激活，{playerName}将在 {numTurns} 后获胜，除非你能在此之前摧毁其一座真理信标。
A Beacon of Truth has been captured. If it is destroyed, our Doomsday timer will be canceled. If you recapture it, you will be able to resume the countdown.
一座真理信标已被夺走。如果信标被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果你重新夺回信标，计时器将会恢复。
A Beacon of Truth has been captured. If it is destroyed, the Doomsday timer will be canceled. If {playerName} recaptures it, then they will be able to resume the countdown.
一座真理信标已被夺走。如果信标被摧毁，末日计时器将会停止。如果{playerName}重新夺回信标，计时器将会恢复。

{playerName} is priming their Final Revelation Doomsday Weapon! If they are allowed to finish, your own Doomsday Weapon will be wiped out, and {playerName} will be but one step away from total victory.
{playerName}正在准备释放“终极启示”末日武器！如果成功释放，你的末日武器将被摧毁，{playerName}距离胜利也将仅剩一步之遥。

Can you feel it? Tangible peace.[br/]Can you hear it? Sweet harmony.[br/]Unified, they bury their weapons[br/]and cherish the differences of their fellows.[br/]Their jubilant dance celebrates a new age of enlightenment.[br/]The stars glimmer approvingly,[br/]beckoning for you to join them.
你感受到那真切的安宁了吗？[br/]你听见那甜蜜的和谐了吗？[br/]他们放下武器，团结一心，[br/]他们彼此珍惜，求同存异。[br/]他们欢欣起舞，庆祝新的启蒙时代的到来。[br/]星辰也闪烁着微光表示赞许，[br/]召唤着你与他们结为一体。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
